title: An Enemy’s Fall Frees Up South Korea’s Leader. Now Comes the Tough Part.
summary_full: President Lee Jae Myung gained legitimacy from his predecessor’s conviction​. But South Korea’s political polarization is caustic, and could get worse.
summary_public: President Lee Jae Myung gained legitimacy from his predecessor’s conviction​. But South Korea’s political polarization is caustic, and could get worse.
